# resc

<!-- badges: start -->

<!-- badges: end -->

A collection of tools specifically for playing with Eurovision Song Contest (ESC) data.

## Installation

You can install the development version of resc from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("Phiido/resc")
```
